flavorText: "At least up here I have some peace and quiet."

foreignData.flavorText: „Zumindest habe ich hier oben meine Ruhe."
foreignData.name: Gefangen im Turm
foreignData.text:
Verzaubert eine nichtfliegende Kreatur
Die verzauberte Kreatur kann nicht angreifen oder blocken, und ihre aktivierten Fähigkeiten können nicht aktiviert werden.

foreignData.flavorText: "Al menos aquí arriba tengo un poco de tranquilidad...".
foreignData.name: Atrapada en la torre
foreignData.text:
Encantar criatura sin la habilidad de volar.
La criatura encantada no puede atacar ni bloquear y no pueden activarse sus habilidades activadas.

foreignData.flavorText: « Au moins ici je suis en paix et au calme. »
foreignData.name: Prisonnière de la tour
foreignData.text:
Enchanter : créature sans le vol
La créature enchantée ne peut ni attaquer ni bloquer et ses capacités activées ne peuvent pas être activées.

foreignData.flavorText: "Almeno quassù ho un po' di pace e tranquillità."
foreignData.name: Intrappolata nella Torre
foreignData.text:
Incanta creatura senza volare
La creatura incantata non può attaccare o bloccare e le sue abilità attivate non possono essere attivate.

foreignData.flavorText: 「少なくともここには平穏と静けさがあるわ。」
foreignData.name: 塔への閉じ込め
foreignData.text:
エンチャント（飛行を持たないクリーチャー）
エンチャントしているクリーチャーでは攻撃もブロックもできず、それの起動型能力は起動できない。
foreignData.type: エンチャント — オーラ

foreignData.flavorText: "최소한 이 위에는 평화와 고요함이 조금이나마 있어."
foreignData.name: 탑에 갇히다
foreignData.text:
비행이 없는 생물에게 부여
부여된 생물은 공격하거나 방어할 수 없으며, 그 생물의 활성화능력은 활성화될 수 없다.

foreignData.flavorText: "Pelo menos aqui em cima eu tenho paz e sossego."
foreignData.name: Aprisionada na Torre
foreignData.text:
Encantar criatura sem voar
A criatura encantada não pode atacar nem bloquear e suas habilidades ativadas não podem ser ativadas.

foreignData.name: Заточение в Башне
foreignData.text:
Зачаровать существо без Полета
Зачарованное существо не может атаковать или блокировать, и его активируемые способности не могут быть активированы.

foreignData.flavorText: 「至少在这上面我还能有一丝清静。」
foreignData.name: 受困高塔
foreignData.text:
结附于不具飞行异能的生物
所结附的生物不能进行攻击或阻挡，且其起动式异能都不能起动。

foreignData.flavorText: 「至少在這上面我還能有一絲清靜。」
foreignData.name: 受困高塔
foreignData.text:
結附於不具飛行異能的生物
所結附的生物不能進行攻擊或阻擋，且其起動式異能都不能起動。

name: Trapped in the Tower
originalText:
Enchant creature without flying
Enchanted creature can't attack or block, and its activated abilities can't be activated.

rulings.text: If the enchanted creature gains flying, Trapped in the Tower is put into your graveyard as a state-based action. The creature won't get stuck in the tower again when it loses flying.

Activated abilities contain a colon. They're generally written “[Cost]: [Effect].” Some keyword abilities are activated abilities and will have colons in their reminder text. Triggered abilities (starting with “when,” “whenever,” or “at”) are unaffected by Trapped in the Tower.

text:
Enchant creature without flying
Enchanted creature can't attack or block, and its activated abilities can't be activated.
